tasks.title: Implement bd doctor checks + optional brew audit
tasks.body:

- validates config completeness, formula consistency, repo state
- runs brew audit only when requested and reports actionable output
- exits with defined error code on failures

- Falls back to existing missing-field error if inference fails.
- Add regression test covering inference.

tasks.title: Write README with install + usage for early testing
tasks.body:
Goal: Provide quick install/build/run instructions so early testers can use the CLI before Homebrew packaging.

DoD:
- README includes: build from source (cargo), basic usage examples for bd init/release/doctor, and note that Homebrew install is not yet available.

- Uses repo-local commands and relative paths.

tasks.title: Implement bd init --import-formula merge path
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- reads existing Formula/*.rb and extracts fields per merge policy
- config fills gaps only; formula remains source-of-truth
- non-interactive mode refuses overwrite without --force

tasks.title: Implement bd init interactive flow (detect, prompt, preview, write)

- prompts for missing fields and shows defaults
- previews config/formula writes and confirms before applying

tasks.title: Implement GitHub tap repo creation flow

- returns created repo clone URL

tasks.title: Implement bd release pipeline (discovery, assets, formula update)

- discovers GitHub release per configured tag/version rules
- selects assets per OS/arch config + overrides

tasks.title: Implement GitHub asset download + SHA256 helper
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- downloads a release asset URL with optional size limit
- computes SHA256 locally
- returns clear Network errors on non-2xx or size limit exceeded
- supports auth token header when provided

tasks.title: Implement GitHub release discovery + asset listing
tasks.body:
Acceptance:
- fetches releases via GitHub API using config.host.api_base defaulting to https://api.github.com
- supports latest stable release selection and tag lookup
- filters draft releases and optionally prereleases
- exposes asset name + download URL list for release

tasks.title: Improve metadata detection conflicts + git remote fallback

- Detect multiple manifests and error on conflicting fields (name/version/license/homepage/bin).
- Use Git remote (origin preferred) to infer name/homepage when missing or no manifests.
- Normalize scoped package.json names to unscoped for project name + bin default.
Notes: aligns with PRD metadata detection requirements.
